## I18nAddtionalOptions interface

I18n Options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface I18nAddtionalOptions 
```

## Remarks

`I18nOptions` is inherited [ComposerOptions](./vue-i18n.composeroptions.md) and [VueI18nOptions](./vue-i18n.vuei18noptions.md)<!-- -->, so you can specify these options.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [legacy](./vue-i18n.i18naddtionaloptions.legacy.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether vue-i18n legacy API use on your Vue App. |
